metadata.name: Blazar 0 Club
metadata.description:
A badge providing membership in the Blazar Force. Blazar Force is a Decentralized Autonomous Guild that games across the blockchains and rewards its members in tokens.

 Ownership of this NFT allows instant eligibility of gaming rewards upon verification in our discord (https://discord.gg/DfkZXNXhhP).  
 The art is homage to Blazar Force's first NFT.
